post_title: Help, how can i solve this problem, i cant play this game properly
post_body:
https://preview.redd.it/gsa7f4bpzv3e1.png?width=297&format=png&auto=webp&s=e2e4c9dad19e6a8e47c063fb8db723b5e407c860

https://preview.redd.it/eg0l8g590w3e1.png?width=274&format=png&auto=webp&s=e329f27732435bb528d9eb5d7af4312ba20f4bf0

Many times during the game I have these "lakes" and the screen freezes and I can't do anything for a few seconds and then it comes back, or others that are very short and only last a little bit but it is very annoying and prevents me from playing. My specifications are:

Ryzen 5 7600  
Rtx 4060 ti 16gb 

32 ram 4800 MT/s

1tb nvme

and im using wifi

post_title: Custom Nametag
post_body:
Why are there still no colored nametags? We have stickers, charms, agents, weapons, and in all of these thereâ€™s a great variety, except for nametags... 
Itâ€™s still the same basic design, black background with white letters, which doesn't add anything new.
We could have nametags in holo or gold, or even in different colors...
If thereâ€™s so much investment in the game, why not new nametags? It could be something minimalistic, but I'm sure it would be great for those who like crafting.

post_title: How do I play 4:3 stretched on a 16:10 monitor?
post_body:
Hey yall,

I recently switched from a laptop with a 16:9 display to one with 16:10, and I cannot play on 4  by 3 the way it used to. On this 16:10 display, 4:3 barely stretches, it almost looks like 16:10 res on the 16:9 display. Is there any way to make it look more stretched?

By the way, it has an AMD CPU, so no Intel applications on it.

post_title: How to make those 1v5 servers?
post_body: I saw dima wallhacks video where its 1v5 but one player has wallhacks. How do i make this to play with my friends? I thought it was just actual cheats at first but then theres also a video where theres an invisible player and if he makes a sound then it reveals him for a second. Im just really intersted in if its possible to make this yourself, because i would love to play this with my friends.

post_title: Aleksib nominated for Finland's athlete of the year
post_body:
Link to Finnish source [https://www.urheilugaala.fi/ehdokkaat/vuoden-urheilija](https://www.urheilugaala.fi/ehdokkaat/vuoden-urheilija)

This award is considered one of the biggest achievements/honors that a Finnish athlete can get. Other nominees include for example Lauri Markkanen (NBA star), Alexander Barkov (NHL champion) and Lukas Hradecky (Bundesliga champion). Aleksib is the first ever esports athlete nominated for this category.

#

post_title: Any tips for improving?
post_body: I'll keep it short. I have played cs since 2015, training at least 15-30 mins my raw aim, counter-strafing, peeking and nades. My peak was LE (csgo) and currently i stand at 13k+lvl 6 faceit. Problem is that I hit a wall in my improvement. I have a relatively hard time to carry most of my matches and I feel like I've started to actually deteriorate. I'm the one at fault, not the matchmaking, the cheaters nor my team. What did help you improve and make your CS experience a bit more consistent and richer?
